alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued January 13 at 10:44AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... FLASH FLOOD WARNING CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS. However, the Flash Flood Watch remains in effect through Friday night. UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1044 TAEAO ASO TOFI IANUARI 13 2022 UA IAI NEI SE ...UA FAAMUTAINA le LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA le LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS. Peita`i, o loo tumau pea le Nofo Va`ava`ia mo Tafega ma Lologa e oo atu i le po Aso Faraile. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
info.instruction: Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
